DocLocalization.Name: Textur - als Liste der Pixel gegeben

DocAttribute.Name: Width
DocAttribute.Documentation: The number of pixels in width (S) direction.

DocAttribute.Name: Height
DocAttribute.Documentation: The number of pixels in height (T) direction.

DocAttribute.Name: ColourComponents
DocAttribute.Documentation: Indication whether the pixel values contain a 1, 2, 3, or 4 colour component.

DocAttribute.Name: Pixel

DocWhereRule.Name: MinPixelInS
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The minimum number of pixel in width (S coordinate) direction shall be 1.

DocWhereRule.Name: MinPixelInT
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The minimum number of pixel in height (T coordinate) direction shall be 1.

DocWhereRule.Name: NumberOfColours
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The number of color components shall be either 1, 2, 3, or 4.

DocWhereRule.Name: SizeOfPixelList
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The list of pixel shall have exactly width\*height members.

DocWhereRule.Name: PixelAsByteAndSameLength
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The binary value provided for each _Pixel_ shall be a multiple of 8 bits. And all pixel shall have the same binary length.
DocWhereRule.Expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(temp<* Pixel | (BLENGTH(temp) MOD 8 = 0) AND (BLENGTH(temp) = BLENGTH(Pixel[1])) )) = SIZEOF(Pixel)
